# AudioPromptInfo

For 'Audio' mode only. Prompt media reference

**Properties**

| Name | Type | Required | Description                     |
| :--- | :--- | :------- | :------------------------------ |
| uri  | str  | ❌       | Link to a prompt audio file     |
| id\_ | str  | ❌       | Internal identifier of a prompt |
